Cape Fear is functional, and the staff is friendly and helpful. The teachers are very helpful, knowledgeable and articulate about the subjects they teach. The school is continuously expanding and growing

textAfterTable: Dorm Life community colleges do not have dorms. Academic Rigor I work full time. 2 classes a semester is all i can handle. you have to allow enough time to study. Tips for prospective students Time management is key! In three sentences I have really enjoyed the variety of courses offered: evening, hybrid, or on-line courses. The staff is phenomenal, especially at the North Campus. Opportunity has knocked on the door for students that want to extend their associate in business degree through NC Wesleyan at CFCC North Campus!
